protein.specific_function: Calcium-regulated membrane-binding protein whose affinity for calcium is greatly enhanced by anionic phospholipids. It binds two calcium ions with high affinity. May be involved in heat-stress response

reference.reference_text: Spano F, Raugei G, Palla E, Colella C, Melli M: Characterization of the human lipocortin-2-encoding multigene family: its structure suggests the existence of a short amino acid unit undergoing duplication. Gene. 1990 Nov 15;95(2):243-51.
